name: Active
description: The player is an active participant in Ozraid events and raids.

name: Inactive
description: The player has not actively participated in Ozraid events and raids for over 6 months without notification.

name: Banned
description: The player has been banned from participating in Ozraid events and raids.

name: Application Awaiting Review
description: The player's application to join Ozraid is awaiting review by an Ozraid Raid Leader or Administrator.

name: Application Declined
description: The player's application to join Ozraid was declined by an Ozraid Raid Leader or Administrator.
